Events that occurred on 17 September.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1928 – Voice actor Roddy McDowall is born.
1937 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 15a.
1945 – Actor Bruce Spence is born.
1972 – J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 341.
1993 – Oxonmoot 1993 at University College.
1994 – Oxonmoot 1994 at University College.
1995 – Oxonmoot 1995 at University College.
2004 – Oxonmoot 2004 at St Hilda's College.
2005 – Oxonmoot 2005 at St Peter's College.
2006 – Oxonmoot 2006 at Somerville College.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Gandalf is held captive by Saruman on the pinnacle of Orthanc.
Boromir travels towards Rivendell to ask for counsel.
